description.lang: This device is an accessory of the Z-Wave system and enable detection of opened or closed access locations in your home. ZD 2102 Z-Wave Door/Window SensorThis device is an accessory of the Z-Wave system and enable detection of opened or closed access locations in your home. Features:*Detects when your door/window is opened or closed*Magnetic separation trigger function*Hidden tamper prevention Trigger*Low battery detection*External Switch*Z-Wave 5.02 SDK*100ft line of sight*LED Status Indicator*Operating temp: -15oC~60oC*Working Voltage: 3V*Dimensions: 87*25*21mm
